title: Evaporative Canister - Removal

body.body: Observe the warning advice given in the General Information section on the safe handling of fuel and fuel containers.
A fire, causing personal injury and damage to property could result from spilled fuel or fuel not handled or stored correctly.
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Note the position, orientation and routing of all hoses connected to the evaporative cannister for installation.
Disconnect the purge valve and fuel tank hoses from the right hand side of the evaporative cannister.
Remove the evaporative cannister from the battery tray, withdrawing the air and drain hoses as you do so.
If necessary, disconnect the air and drain hoses from the left hand side of the cannister.
